verses.roman:
bāhuḍiyā sei daśa jana āila ghara
tāṅra mātā-pitā ha-ila cintita antara

synonyms: bāhuḍiyā—returning; sei—those; daśa jana—ten men; āila ghara—came back home; tāṅra—his; mātā-pitā—mother and father; ha-ila—became; cintita—full of anxiety; antara—within themselves.
translation: The ten men returned home, and Raghunātha dāsa's father and mother were filled with anxiety.
